title: Reconnected tabs reopen at the end
author: pedroeloy
body_snippet:

<!-- Bug -->
|Detail|Value|
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7011.34996  |

1. Open 2 tab connections
2. Do a Reconnect on the first tab.
3. The reconnected tab loses its position and reopens at the end of ...

iterations.description: The behavior is verified, user-visible tab-order breakage, and reports confirm it still occurs on current DockPanelSuite tags, so reconnect logic should be fixed in mRemoteNG.

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet: Still occurs with the current dockpanelsuite tags

notes:
AI triage (codex): The behavior is verified, user-visible tab-order breakage, and reports confirm it still occurs on current DockPanelSuite tags, so reconnect logic should be fixed in mRemoteNG.
Approach: Update reconnect to reuse the existing tab in place instead of closing and recreating it at the end, then add a regression test asserting tab index is preserved.
